title: Cane Creek’s New GXC Gravel and XC MTB Stem
content:
Cane Creek just rolled out these impressively lightweight XC and gravel stems, dubbed the GXC ($69.99). Let’s check out the specs below.

With weights as low as 96 grams for the 60 mm length and 120 grams for the 100 mm, the GXC is a great bargain for those looking for a lightweight cockpit for their gravel bike.

Specs:

  • Colors: Polished black & polished silver
  • Lengths: 60mm, 70mm, 80mm, 90mm, 100mm
  • Angle: +/- 6°
  • Weight
    96g : 60mm
    104g : 70mm
    112g : 80mm
    116g : 90mm
    120g : 100mm
  • Bar Clamp: 31.8mm
  • Steerer Clamp Height: 42mm
  • Material: Forged and machined 6066 aluminum alloy
  • Hardware: Stainless Steel
  • Graphics: Ghosted, laser-etched Cane Creek logos
  • Accessories: Compatible with Cane Creek Computer Mount

See more at Cane Creek.
